comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: What an extraordinary road - an accident waiting to happen! Evidently it recently (1999) closed to traffic, and is now used by walkers and mountain-bikers. As seen from a hang glider - www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9M33_aiFIA - or a mountain bike - www.youtube.com/watch?v=fYaLzM7mzVk
